snippet: The director of state-run Egyptian radio and television barred the women from appearing on the air for a month, and ordered them to go on a diet....
abstract: Eight anchorwomen on Egyptian state-run television are suspended for month and ordered to go on diet because they are overweight.
lead_paragraph: The director of state-run Egyptian radio and television barred the women from appearing on the air for a month, and ordered them to go on a diet.

headline.main: Egypt Suspends 8 Female TV Anchors, Saying They Are Overweight
headline.print_headline: Egyptian TV Suspends Eight Women Over Weight
